mng: big, huge, large, major, great, wide, deep, older (than), oldest, eldest, greatly, very much, (dialect) father, father's elder or younger brother

exm.mng: dimension, magnitude, size, measurement, large and small, at any rate, adults and children, consideration of seniority
great amount, large quantity, bulk, numerous, generous, magnanimous
in large part, the greater part, the majority
not very, not too, not often
